summary:
Attacking someone with magic while sneaking will now grant a sneak-attack bonus.

Successful magic sneak-attacks will cause the sneak-attack sound to play, accompanied by an on-screen message. Magic sneak-attacks will also level the Sneak skill.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][i][b]Magic Sneak Attack[/b][/i][/size][/center]
[youtube]Nv0_khWJV9w[/youtube][center][/center][center][/center][youtube]FlEiM1BMa9U[/youtube]


[size=4][b]What is this?[/b][/size]
This mod grants you a 3x damage bonus for magic attacks done while undetected. You'll hear the sneak-attack sound and see the on-screen sneak-attack message, just like you would when sniping someone with a bow. Magic sneak attacks will also level the Sneak skill.


[size=4][b]Why should I download this mod?[/b][/size]
Other mods that add sneak attack bonuses for magic mess with the Sneak perk tree. This one doesn't. Also, some of those mods don't actually work. This one does.


[b][size=4]Does this edit/add any perks?[/size][/b]
No.


[size=4][b]Is it compatible with ___?[/b][/size]
Yes. If fill-in-the-blank mod ALSO adds a sneak attack bonus for magic, however, your stealthy mage will probably be OP.
[size=4][b]

I hit someone with a fireball while sneaking but it didn't do any bonus damage! What the heck?![/b][/size]
Magic is loud. And colorful. THIS MEANS THE BANDIT YOU'RE ATTACKING IS VERY LIKELY TO NOTICE YOU SLINKING AROUND UNDER THE STAIRS IF YOU TRY TO HIT HIM IN THE FACE WITH A FIREBALL. Morale of the story: if the on-screen eye is open and says 'detected' before your spell hits, you've been caught and there will be no magic sneak bonus for you.

Hint: The Quiet Casting perk is your friend.


[size=4][b]My mod-added Restoration Death-Mage spell didn't get a sneak-attack bonus! [/b][/size]
ONLY spells that are tagged as being fire, ice, or shock will give you a sneak-attack bonus. Mostly, this is stuff in the Destruction school. Why not have EVERY spell get a sneak attack bonus, you ask? Simple. Imagine you're an Illusion mage, and just by slinking around in the shadows your Calm spell is suddenly 3x more powerful and can tame a dragon. Pretty OP, I'd say.
